header.name: chaos/preprocessor/recursion/delve.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a mechanism used to count the number of scans that an argument undergoes as it travels through a macro.

macro.abstract: The macro counts the number of scans that it undergoes.
macro.para: This macro counts the number of scans that it undergoes while passing through other macros. It finally expands to that count when the context created by is detected.

macro.abstract: The macro is an identity macro used to create a context that causes invocations of to stop counting.

usage.param: The argument possibly containing invocations of to be halted.
The argument possibly containing invocations of to be halted.

macro.para: This macro expands to x or __VA_ARGS__ causing any invocations of therein to expand to their current counts.
